name: Robin Sherman

jv_history.source_quote: Robin works collaboratively with colleagues and direct reports. She is proactive in anticip

what_you_do: I have a lifelong passion helping others to thrive like never before! With a love for holistic health, now for over 25 years, I have been studying and supporting clients in the holistic health and wellness field.
who_you_serve: I'm passionate about sharing this journey with others, helping them rediscover their inner strength and self-worth.
social_proof: Certified Mental Fitness & Spiritual Coach, Happiness Trainer, Meditation/Ayurveda Instructor, Positive Intelligence Coach, and have been mentored by transformational leaders: Deepak Chopra, Shirzad Chamine (Positive Intelligence), Debra Poneman (Yes to Success) and Marci Shimoff (Author of NY Times bestsellers Happy for No Reason, and Chicken Soup for the Woman's Soul series)
signature_programs: Certified Mental Fitness & Spiritual Coach, Certified Primordial Sound Meditation Teacher, Certified Chopra Health Instructor, Positive Intelligence Coach
audience_type: individuals seeking personal growth and transformation
business_focus: Helping others thrive through holistic health, wellness, and personal development coaching.
